items.sentence: I really appreciate you letting me use your apartment.

Tom wanted to know exactly what he was supposed to do.
The post office is down the street. You can't miss it.

How far is it from here to the nearest police station?
Does Tom really think he can convince Mary to do that?
Our economy is going through a period of great stress.
